def main():
    t = int(input())
    for i in range(t):
        a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
        res = 0
        if a == b == c:
            print(res)
            print(a, b, c)
        else:
            if a == b:
                if b == c - 1:
                    res = 1
                    print(res)
                    print(a, b, c)
                else:
                    c = c - c % b
                    res = ((c - b) // 2) + 1
                    print(res)
                    print(a, b, c)
            else:
                if b == c:
                    if a == b - 1:
                        res = 1
                        print(res)
                        print(a, b, c)
                    else:
                        a = a + b - a % b
                        res = ((b - a) // 2) + 1
                        print(res)
                        print(a, b, c)
                else:
                    if a == b == c - 1:
                        res = 2
                        print(res)
                        print(a, b, c)
                    else:
                        if a == b:
                            a = a + b - a % b
                            res = ((b - a) // 2) + 1
                            print(res)
                            print(a, b, c)
                        else:
                            if b == c:
                                c = c - c % b
                                res = ((c - b) // 2) + 1
                                print(res)
                                print(a, b, c)
                            else:
                                if a == b - 1 and b == c - 1:
                                    res = 3
                                    print(res)
                                    print(a, b, c)
                                else:
                                    if a == b - 1:
                                        c = c - c % b
                                        res = ((c - b) // 2) + 1
                                        print(res)
                                        print(a, b, c)
                                    else:
                                        if b == c - 1:
                                            a = a + b - a % b
                                            res = ((b - a) // 2) + 1
                                            print(res)
                                            print(a, b, c)
                                        else:
                                            if a < b:
                                                if a > b - c:
                                                    a = a + b - a % b
                                                    res = ((b - a) // 2) + 1
                                                    print(res)
                                                    print(a, b, c)
                                                else:
                                                    c = c - c % b
                                                    res = ((c - b) // 2) + 1
                                                    print(res)
                                                    print(a, b, c)
                                            else:
                                                if a > b:
                                                    if a < b + c:
                                                        c = c - c % b
                                                        res = ((c - b) // 2) + 1
                                                        print(res)
                                                        print(a, b, c)
                                                    else:
                                                        a = a + b - a % b
                                                        res = ((b - a) // 2) + 1
                                                        print(res)
                                                        print(a, b, c)
                                                else:
                                                    print("Error")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# cook your dish here
from math import gcd
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    if a == c:
        print(0)
        print(a, b, c)
    else:
        x = gcd(b, a)
        y = gcd(c, b)
        z = gcd(c, a)
        if x == a:
            print(c-b)
            print(a, b, c)
        elif y == b:
            print(a-b)
            print(a, b, c)
        elif z == a:
            print(c-a)
            print(a, b, c)
        else:
            print(a-x)
            print(x, b, c)
